> <OLD>
>
> Nightshift leads the way, but cautiously.  He sniffs around and swivels his
> ears.
>
> " Okay, anyone ever get the feeln' we're be'n watched?  I sure got that
> feeln' right now."
>
> He slowly walks forward, and moves quietly, without disturbing anything
> along the way.

<OLD>

As NIGHTSHIFT approached the main door, however it opened easily to a
touch from POLAR CLAW who was right behind him this time.

The room that was revealed was what one might consider as a foyer or
better yet a waitying room. It was farily non-descript with walls of a
greyish white. There was a small monitor on the otherside of the room
and seats along the wall. This was as far in as probrably most mechs
were allowed to go if they were not part of the watchers. Nothing
secret be seen here but anyone in here could be scanned and probed by
those on the inside.

There was nothing signifigant about this room except for the door that
led further into the tower.

POLAR CLAW and the others followed in closely behind.

"We need to go through the door to the communication's section." POLAR
CLAW said as he looked around. "The back up antenna control should be
there."

WOLFGANG nodded, "But we are going to need power too." He pointed to
the monitors, "I don't see any lights or power here."

The door to the outside slid closed as PROWL enetered keeping out the
winter weather. "The generator is down a level not far from the
storage area. I bet a circiut blew when we blew the main antenna."

POLAR CLAW nodded, "Nightshift, you and Prowl get to the communication
section. Wolfgang and I can get the power back on fairly quickly."

(TAG)

- Preston
